review:
I played the original OW1, I thought it had some good potentinal with some good ideas, i thought the review bombing was very useless if it was such a good game, but holy... i was SO WRONG!

Last time I ever played was OW1, before they added Ash, that's when they should've stopped adding characters and buffing old characters. I thought this game wouldn't be greedy, but guess what? 85% of OW1 Characters are locked and guess what's even funnier? ALL ARE ABLE TO BE UNLOCKED BY PAYING!!! FOR A DLC THAT DIDN'T EVEN WORK AT THE START!

The new maps sucks, the fact that FOV is locked at 103 is strange, last good update and most remeberable was the one where it was the circle map and you could 1v1, except from that, I think that there was a bunch of un-ncessacary changes, Mcree name change, Locked OW1 Characters, Removal of lootboxes (and yes, i am SAD THAT LOOTBOXES ARE GONE!!! SOMEONE THAT SPENT 700 DOLLARS ON ADVANCED WARFARE CASES IS SAD THAT LOOTBOXES ARE GONE!!!) I think the worst part about this was the fact that GENJI and HANZO arent even UNLOCKED NORMALLY!!! THE TWO BEST CHARACTERS!!! OW2 Is a paid game and I will continue playing it because I haven't played OW2 So much yet (0.8 hours so far) but OMG there are so much stupid changes. I thought the TF2 Glazers were wrong, nope. 100% right, this game sucks and it always will. heres how i think they can change that:

Add a sort of "Legacy" Mode: OW1 Characters only (anything after Ashe should be considered OW2), OW1 Maps only, Pre-nerfs and Pre-Buffs, Old hud (I don't have anything aganst the new hud at all, I think it looks nice, just not better then OW1)

Offline mode: Simpliest way to get people to still play your game after the servers shut down, It's how games like BO1 and WAW continue to still be playable to this day.

REAL workshop: I need my naked widowmaker and tracer mods, self explainatory oh yeah, also custom maps, hammer-like map editor, FOV and VIEWMODEL FOV unlockers, and custom characters maybe. I dont think they will ever allow custom skins from workshop to be used in public games cuz its blizzard and they can't stop the drinking milk from women.

HUD Customizer of sorts: (yes, i get that theres already one, but i think it should be possible to change fonts, change font colors and all of the trinkets and sorts.)

In terms of "Hero" shooters, this isn't gonna beat TF2, I think that TF2 will be overtaken, I just don't think this is it. also there isn't anything satisfying about killing people anymore, I STG there was a really good sound for it, but it just doesn't exsist anymore. I think if they use the template for l4d and TF2, i think that will overtake TF2 entirely, otherwize, this game isn't gonna be good at all.

& Yes, I do think that it was a good idea to switch over to OW2, just not with all the greedy things they did to OW2, glad the models got leaked for yk what.
fun game but the player base ruins it
I dont care about the pve. Game is fun.

It's the biggest piece of dogshit that I have ever heard. Everyone's laughing btw but it's true cause everybody's heard it too. Everyone heard it right? Everyone's like yeah, biggest piece of dogshit.
You know what I want to say
Porn industry care more about this franchise than the devs themselves.

Åšwietna i darmowa gra, ludzie narzekajÄ… na mikrotranzakcje mi sÄ… one jednak obojÄ™tne :)

I know a lot of new players will be like, "what's all the negativity about? This is a gorgeous game with lots of gameplay and tech to get into" etc etc etc... If you didn't play Ow1 and are unaware of all the drama, problems, and poor management the franchise has undergone over the last 5 or so years, then I highly suggest looking into this. It won't take long to find the widespread disappointment this game has left it's die hard fans across the internet.

The graphics, characters, lore, animations are beautifully done, they always have been and it's hard not to love that... But Ow2 really disrespected their original fanbase that now it's just sad to see these things knowing how hard the game fumbled. They completely removed the original game from existence, removed many features like various progression, end of match cards, and more... and instead introduced the battlepass as the only form of progression, characters locked behind battlepass paywalls, re-releasing old skins that people collected over the years as "new", started charging absurd prices for actual new skins and "bundles" you have no options in. Not to mention cancelling the highly anticipated PvE content which was the only thing players had to look forward to... (no, the little bite-sized missions with A.I. that we've had recycled for years is not the PvE everyone was promised)

It was just a bunch of really poor decisions that essentially spat in the faces of the massive fanbase who absolutely loved this franchise and instead shifted their focus to a newer, naive, fortnite addicted generation who grew up on live-service games and will gladly shell out cash for insanely priced digital assets.

P.S. the fact that this is on Steam now is a shock, I never expected them to actually release one of their games outside of battlenet. I'm assuming it's a desperate attempt to rope in new players because the perception of the game is now horrible and the franchise seems to be crashing and burning.... But who knows.

Don't give these guys money.

Played since Overwatch 1, the loot boxes sucked but were manageable anyway, I played for over 2000 hours until the release of Overwatch 2, at which I stopped. Not just because of losing one tank and essentially losing the magic of this chaotic shooter in the process, but also because of the monetization. I took one look at the gallery seeing the mythic skins I had missed and wondered if there was a way to get them... nope. You snooze you lose. And the battle pass is greedy. On top of that, the singleplayer PVE was cancelled. So no. Skip.
